answers.answer: Sometimes. I'd ask your provider to check it out since swelling can sometimes be a symptom of preeclampsia, but it's usually just annoying not dangerous.
Ah, gotcha. My blood pressure is good, so I'm not too terribly concerned. I think it is just from standing and walking all day at work. It is just uncomfortable :p
Elevate your feet as often as possible and drink tons of water!

question: I know it is normal to have some swelling in the feet and ankle area, but my swelling goes all the way up, just past my knees. They are extremely sore and achey. Is it normal for it to go all the way up the leg like this?
title: Swelling up the leg?
